definition: a commitment to tell the truth (especially in a court of law)
details:
noun
- a commitment to tell the truth (especially in a court of law)
= example: a commitment to tell the truth (especially in a court of law)
= synonyms: swearing
- profane or obscene expression usually of surprise or anger
= synonyms: swearing, curse, curse word, expletive, swearword, cuss
- a solemn promise, usually invoking a divine witness, regarding your future acts or behavior
= example: a solemn promise, usually invoking a divine witness, regarding your future acts or behavior
